version_description:
Version 3.1

- bug in navigation fixed

Version 3.0

- application was completely redesigned to offer better experience for all of many users
- now it's Periodic Table+ universal application, you can run it on both iPad and iPhone devices
- advanced filter were added, you can set own filter using most of elements properties to get group of element which you need (element which matches all of your conditions will be highlighted)
- added data of isotopes of all elements
- data of all elements were updated and some properties were added
- 6 languages (English, Czech, German, Spanish, French and Italian)
- 3 temperature units (Celsius, Kelvin, Fahrenheit)
